casebody.data:
Argued February 28, STATE OF OREGON, Respondent, v. ROY BENJAMIN SOUTHERLAND (No. C 72-05-1596 Cr), Appellant. 506 P2d 728 J. Marvin Kuhn, Deputy Public Defender, Salem, argued the cause for appellant. With him on the brief was Gary D. Babcock, Public Defender, Salem. John W. Burgess, Assistant Attorney General, Salem, argued the cause for respondent. With him on the brief were Lee Johnson, Attorney General, and John W. Osburn, Solicitor General, Salem.

affirmed February 28,

petition for rehearing denied March 22, petition for review denied May 22, 1973

Before Schwab, Chief Judge, and Foley and Thornton, Judges.
